    • 方法详细资料

      • generateKeyPair

        public static KeyPair generateKeyPair()
                               throws NoSuchProviderException,
                                      NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                      InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        获取密钥
        返回:
        java.security.KeyPair 密钥对
        抛出:
        NoSuchProviderException
        NoSuchAlgorithmException
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException

      • encrypt

        public static byte[] encrypt(org.bouncycastle.jcajce.provider.asymmetric.ec.BCECPublicKey pubKey,
                             byte[] srcData)
                      throws org.bouncycastle.crypto.InvalidCipherTextException
        参数:
        pubKey - 公钥加密
        srcData - 原文
        返回:
        加密后数据
        抛出:
        org.bouncycastle.crypto.InvalidCipherTextException

      • encrypt

        public static byte[] encrypt(org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.ECPublicKeyParameters pubKeyParameters,
                             byte[] srcData)
                      throws org.bouncycastle.crypto.InvalidCipherTextException
        ECC公钥加密
        参数:
        pubKeyParameters - ECC公钥
        srcData - 源数据
        返回:
        SM2密文，实际包含三部分：ECC公钥、真正的密文、公钥和原文的SM3-HASH值
        抛出:
        org.bouncycastle.crypto.InvalidCipherTextException

      • decrypt

        public static byte[] decrypt(org.bouncycastle.jcajce.provider.asymmetric.ec.BCECPrivateKey priKey,
                             byte[] sm2Cipher)
                      throws org.bouncycastle.crypto.InvalidCipherTextException
        抛出:
        org.bouncycastle.crypto.InvalidCipherTextException

      • decrypt

        public static byte[] decrypt(org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.ECPrivateKeyParameters priKeyParameters,
                             byte[] sm2Cipher)
                      throws org.bouncycastle.crypto.InvalidCipherTextException
        ECC私钥解密
        参数:
        priKeyParameters - ECC私钥
        sm2Cipher - SM2密文，实际包含三部分：ECC公钥、真正的密文、公钥和原文的SM3-HASH值
        返回:
        原文
        抛出:
        org.bouncycastle.crypto.InvalidCipherTextException

      • sign

        public static byte[] sign(org.bouncycastle.jcajce.provider.asymmetric.ec.BCECPrivateKey priKey,
                          byte[] srcData)
                   throws org.bouncycastle.crypto.CryptoException
        抛出:
        org.bouncycastle.crypto.CryptoException

      • sign

        public static byte[] sign(org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.ECPrivateKeyParameters priKeyParameters,
                          byte[] withId,
                          byte[] srcData)
                   throws org.bouncycastle.crypto.CryptoException
        ECC私钥签名
        参数:
        priKeyParameters - ECC私钥
        withId - 可以为null，若为null，则默认withId为字节数组:"1234567812345678".getBytes()
        srcData - 源数据
        返回:
        签名
        抛出:
        org.bouncycastle.crypto.CryptoException

      • verify

        public static boolean verify(org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.ECPublicKeyParameters pubKeyParameters,
                             byte[] srcData,
                             byte[] sign)

      • verify

        public static boolean verify(org.bouncycastle.jcajce.provider.asymmetric.ec.BCECPublicKey pubKey,
                             byte[] withId,
                             byte[] srcData,
                             byte[] sign)

      • verify

        public static boolean verify(org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.ECPublicKeyParameters pubKeyParameters,
                             byte[] withId,
                             byte[] srcData,
                             byte[] sign)
        ECC公钥验签
        参数:
        pubKeyParameters - ECC公钥
        withId - 可以为null，若为null，则默认withId为字节数组:"1234567812345678".getBytes()
        srcData - 原文
        sign - 签名
        返回:
        验签成功返回true，失败返回false

      • convertPrivateKeyToParameters

        public static org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.ECPrivateKeyParameters convertPrivateKeyToParameters(org.bouncycastle.jcajce.provider.asymmetric.ec.BCECPrivateKey ecPriKey)
        获取ECC模式私钥
        参数:
        ecPriKey - 私钥
        返回:
        ECC模式私钥
